data.text:
P. Joseph Lehman, Inc., Consulting Engineers offers a full complement of consulting engineering services available to its clients. From feasibility studies for new bridge construction or rehabilitation, to traffic control plans, to highway intersection and interchange design, to foundation and retaining walls, P. Joseph Lehman, Inc., Consulting Engineers' services are second to none. Our environmental services include everything from assessments to land use planning, stormwater management, regulatory compliance, wetland delineation and mitigation, hazardous waste investigations, NEPA documentation, and threatened and endangered species studies. We also conduct a full spectrum of survey types, including topographic mapping, geodetic control surveys for aerial mapping, and subdivision and development surveys. Our construction services involve project coordination, contract administration, and construction inspection. Among our most effective value-added benefits to clients are our grantsmanship services, provided typically at no cost. In addition to helping our clients to develop a financial plan, we will also investigate potential public and private funding sources and prepare a final written application for funding to the agency on the client's behalf.

Website

http://www.LehmanEngineers.com
